Class InventoryManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.lhaunsp.wguproject.InventoryManagementController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class InventoryManagementController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Universal Controller class that controls all the different menus and FXML files
Author:
Lucas Haunsperger

    • switchToMainScene

      private void switchToMainScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene) throws IOException
      Switches to the main menu FXML file
      Parameters:
      scene - , the current scene
      Throws:
      IOException - Error loading file

    • switchToAddModifyPartScene

      private void switchToAddModifyPartScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene, boolean isAddScene, int partIdx) throws IOException
      Switches to the AddModifyPart Menu FXML file RUNTIME ERROR: *FIXED* Many errors trying to load menus in current controller instance after switching the menu Fixed by finding the controller instance of the new menu and running a menu setup function in it as soon as the new FXML is loaded
      Parameters:
      scene - , the current scene
      isAddScene - , if true, starts add scene, if false starts modify scene
      Throws:
      IOException - Error loading file

    • switchToAddPartScene

      private void switchToAddPartScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene) throws IOException
      Just calls switchToAddModifyPartScene with correct params
      Parameters:
      scene - the current scene
      Throws:
      IOException - Error loading file

    • switchToModifyPartScene

      private void switchToModifyPartScene​(javafx.scene.Scene scene, int partIdx) throws IOException
      Just calls switchToAddModifyPartScene with correct params
      Parameters:
      scene - the current scene
      partIdx - the index of the selected part
      Throws:
      IOException - Error loading file

    • switchToAddModifyProductScene

      Parameters:
      scene - , the current scene
      isAddScene - , if true, starts add scene, if false starts modify scene
